title: I just want to drop in and say right now
body: the login in music for {{champion:203}}  is so amazing that i hate to login and stop listening to it, and it reminds me so much of fullmetal alchemist. whichever group worked on this, your awesome. <3 also is there downloads of it available yet? if not then is there an eta on when it might be? i need it in my life{{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
Hey Starkiller X51,

Thanks so much for your kind words :)

The Kindred music is up on our Soundcloud!

Enjoy!

Ed the Conqueror

I just want to say from a musician's point of view and a human being's, this is one of the most emotion filled, passionate, and soul touching piece I have ever heard. 
Creator of the piece needs all of the high-fives.

I just want to drop in an say right now...

I second that.
